sentences.en: Catherine the Great was a patron of the arts and sciences.
sentences.cn: 叶卡捷琳娜大帝资助发展艺术和科学。

sentences.en: Chiswick church is dedicated to St Nicholas, patron saint of sailors.
sentences.cn: 奇西克教堂为水手的守护神圣尼古拉而建。

sentences.en: Frederick the Great was the patron of many artists.
sentences.cn: 腓特烈大帝是许多艺术家的赞助人。

sentences.en: He inscribed those poems to [ for ] his patron.
sentences.cn: 他将这些诗 献给 他的赞助人.

sentences.en: I have found out who my patron is.
sentences.cn: 我已经明白了我的恩主究竟是谁.

sentences.en: It's my patron saint's day, and I'm standing the racket.
sentences.cn: 今天是我的守护神日, 我是负责给钱的.

sentences.en: She is a patron of small businesses and trades.
sentences.cn: 她是几个小企业和小手工艺者的资助人。
圣帕特里克，爱尔兰的主保圣人

sentences.en: St. George is the Patron Saint of England.
sentences.cn: 圣乔治是英格兰的守护神.

sentences.en: The Emperor is a renowned patron of learning.
sentences.cn: 这位皇帝是一位有名的崇尚学术的君王.

sentences.en: The patron of the bar was ejected for creating a disturbance.
sentences.cn: 酒吧客人因制造骚乱而被驱离.

sentences.en: The word " pattern " is derived from the same root as the word patron.
sentences.cn: " 模式 " 这个词与保护神这个词来自同一词根.

sentences.en: They were also given their own temple and patron divinity or hero, whose priests they elected.
sentences.cn: 各个德莫同样也有自己的神庙及守护神或英雄, 并选出侍奉他们的神职人员.

sentences.en: To my patron I will be scrupulously true.
sentences.cn: 我对我的恩人,必须毫不含糊地表示忠诚.

sentences.en: Under the title of Nomios he was regarded by herdsmen as their patron god.
sentences.cn: 牧人视阿波罗为保护神,并称他为诺弥奥斯.

words.tran_cn: 女主顾；女资助人；女保护人
赞助人,出资者,保证人,保护人,庇护人,恩人,支持者,老板,所有者
顾客,主顾,常客,听众,观众,出席者

trans.tran_cn: 赞助人，资助人，顾客，老主顾，保护人，[宗]守护神
trans.tran_en: someone who supports the activities of an organization, for example by giving money
